title: Reverse Linked List
question:
Reverse a singly linked list.

Example:

Input: 1->2->3->4->5->NULL
Output: 5->4->3->2->1->NULL


Follow up:

A linked list can be reversed either iteratively or recursively. Could you implement both?
code: /** * Definition for singly-linked list. * public class ListNode { *     public int val; *     public ListNode next; *     public ListNode(int x) { val = x; } * } */public class Solution {    public ListNode ReverseList(ListNode head) {            }}
